outputs.output_descr: UNV's collaboration with UN Department of Peacekeeping Operations and UN Department of Political Affairs includes support for both substantive and technical needs of UN peace keeping and peace building missions. In substantive areas such as civil affairs, human rights, gender, and child protection, for example, the added value of volunteers are clearly recognized as key to social cohesion, community confidence, local capacity-building and a "light footprint" approach to peace building. UNV plays a key role in post-conflict electoral exercises through the mobilization of substantive and technical UNV expertise.

project_descr: Fully funded UN Volunteer support to UNV Programme Priority Area 6 (PPA 6) on "Operational and Capacity Building Support to UN Missions"
